createArticle.description: Create a new article. Actual new article is hard-coded so the request body here is just for example.

updateArticle.description: Update an existing article. Actual update is hard-coded so the request body here is just for example. Can also swap out the 2345 in the route with 1234 or 3456 to update a different article

deleteArticle.description: Delete an existing article. Can also swap out the 3456 in the route with 1234 or 2345 to delete a different article.
